name: Footsteps App
description: This is a a search 🔎engine of community-made 🧑‍🤝‍🧑learning resources for the 21st-century learner.👨‍💻👩‍💻 Learn by following the footsteps (journey) of experts. Made alongside a browser extension, this app helps in bringing out the best curated content from the experts to everyone.
